headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Beats Forecasts in Q4 Results
summary: The share price of Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) surged by 15.46% between February 2 and February 9, 2026, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Gained the Most This Week. Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) is a leading integrated downstream energy company that operates the largest refining system in the United States. headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Phillips 66, Marathon Petroleum and Valero Energy
summary: PSX, MPC and VLO stand out in oil refining as the industry outperforms despite volatile margins and a weaker earnings outlook.
